bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Chartered Professional Accountants Act.
The following designations are prescribed for the purpose of the definition of "legacy designation" in section 1 of the Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: "Certified General Accountant" or the initials "CGA" signifying that designation;
"Fellow of the Certified General Accountants" or the initials "FCGA" signifying that designation;
"Certified General Accountant, Honorary" or the initials "CGA (Hon.)" signifying that designation;
"Certified Management Accountant" or the initials "CMA" signifying that designation;
"Fellow of the Certified Management Accountants" or the initials "FCMA" signifying that designation;
"Certified Management Accountant, Honorary" or the initials "CMA (Hon.)" signifying that designation;
"Chartered Accountant" or the initials "CA" signifying that designation;
"Fellow of the Chartered Accountants" or the initials "FCA" signifying that designation;
"Chartered Accountant, Honorary" or the initials "CA (Hon.)" signifying that designation;
"Associate of the Chartered Accountants" or the initials "ACA" signifying that designation;
"Registered Industrial Accountant" or the initials "RIA" signifying that designation.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Chartered Professional Accountants Act, S.B.C. 2015, c. 1, section 70]
